## 

```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

source(here::here("R", "functions.R"))

lipidomics <- readr::read_csv(here::here("data", "lipidomics.csv"))

```

## Basic statistics

```{r basic-stats}
# getting the mean and sd of each metabolite

lipidomics %>% 
    group_by(metabolite) %>% 
    summarise(across(value, list(mean = mean, sd = sd))) %>% 
    mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~round(.x, digits = 1)))

```

## Creating figure of metabolite levels

```{r metabolite-figure}

metabolite_distribution_plot <- ggplot(lipidomics, aes(x = value)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")

plot_metabolite_distribution(lipidomics)

```
